title: Buyer1
description:
A reverse version of the current marketplaces, focused on customers needs but at the same time helping sellers
Here you can post what you want to buy and sellers send you offers 
-Buyers save money and time searching for the best deal 
-Sellers save money on customer acquisition and sell proactively

*All the listings in Buyer1.shop are products the users want to buy
Buy without search and sell proactively
